name: BUGS (itch) (ScorpionGames)
description: Hello!!! A normal game, but with intentional bugs. Just be carful with what you do, every part of this incomplete game has at least a one small bug, just try to find as many as you can, but still try to finish the game. I will try to add more features to the game! You can also drag an object, find it, It's easy. Controls; D<>A to Move OR Arrows       Space to Jump Also Drink your milk, its good for your bones. And lets help Dani get more subs.  He deserves it!!!   https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzmtKpQQyZ-9ZNY_bbFtVHw Check Out "Show" a game on itch.io, it helped me Get some of my design ideas!  https://mmatt-ugh.itch.io/show Have a good day/night!
